%title /ab/experiment/{exprimentId} 获取指定的测试测试

=/ab/experiment/{exprimentId} =

==功能 ==
查询指定的experiment信息

==URL==
/ab/experiment/{exprimentId}

==支持格式==
JSON XML

==HTTP请求方式==
GET

==请求参数==
| experimentId | 路径参数 | 数字型 | 要查询的experiment的id号 |

==测试==
{{{ class="brush:bash"
curl -Hacccept:application/xml https://baseurl/experiment/6
curl -Hacccept:application/json https://baseurl/experiment/6
  }}}

==返回结果==

# XML Reslut:
{{{ class="brush:xml"
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<experiment>
    <id>6</id>
    <name>test</name>
    <description>test</description>
    <startDate>2012-10-16 00:00</startDate>
    <endDate>2012-10-16 00:00</endDate>
    <isActive>false</isActive>
    <alternatives>
        <alternative>
            <id>1</id>
            <name>testAlternative</name>
            <description>test alternative description</description>
            <isActive>true</isActive>
            <rules>
                <rule>
                    <id>1</id>
                    <ruleType>PERCENT</ruleType>
                    <value>30</value>
                </rule>
            </rules>
        </alternative>
        <alternative>
            <id>2</id>
            <name>testAlternative</name>
            <description>test alternative description</description>
            <isActive>false</isActive>
            <rules/>
        </alternative>
    </alternatives>
</experiment>
  }}}
